title: How much does my professor swear?
text: It’s the first day of class. We all wander in, wondering what kind of professor we are going to be subject to for the next 16 weeks. The professor rolls in at 9:30 a.m., which is on time, but isn’t there a saying about ‘if you’re on time, you’re late’? Anyway, in the opening remarks, the professor talks about the class. The normal usual. But then, they swore. Then again. And again. And all of a sudden, the professor had the attention of the class. And they said, “If you have a problem with swearing, you might have a problem with this class.” Or something like that.

title: Blog
text:
How much does my professor swear?

















Nov 11, 2023


Kelby Bachman
